price: 65. Mpe ya sôló boyebaki baye oyo balekisaki ndelo na kati ya bino mpona mokolo mwa mposo, mpe tolobaki na bango: bozala bamakako biloko bizangi ntina.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱعۡتَدَوۡاْ مِنكُمۡ فِي ٱلسَّبۡتِ فَقُلۡنَا لَهُمۡ كُونُواْ قِرَدَةً خَٰسِـِٔينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿalim'tumu alladhīna iʿ'tadaw minkum fī al-sabti faqul'nā lahum kūnū qiradatan khāsiīna
